focusZoom_h.teleLimit_Txt: Zoom tele limit - Select a value from the drop-down list to limit the camera's maximum zoom level. Use the Go to button to check the selected limit. The zoom limits are represented by two values. The first is the total zoom limit while the value in the parenthesis followed by a D, is the amount of the total limit that is digital.
focusZoom_h.autoFocus_Txt: Auto focus - Check this box to enable the camera's auto focus. This setting is enabled by default.
focusZoom_h.focusNearLimit_Txt: Focus near limit - The near focus limit can be set to avoid focusing on objects too close to the camera.
focusZoom_h.focOptZoomMonitor_Txt: To set Focus & Zoom when you have selected Optical zoom for monitoring:
focusZoom_h.focOptZoomMonitor2_Txt: Go to PTZ > Preset Positions and follow the instructions to set the focus. In order to be able to retain this focus position after restarting the camera, enter a name for this preset in the Current position field and select the Use current position as Home option.
focusZoom_h.focOptZoomMonitor3_Txt: If you re-calibrate the optics while in this Optical zoom for monitoring mode, this preset has to be re-selected from the Available positions drop down list (PTZ > Preset Positions).
